### canonicalizeDwarfOperations() {#ade8a5e3b6a082e4cb8bb4202ae7f652a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SmallVector&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; canonicalizeDwarfOperations (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; WorkingOps)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This function will canonicalize:

<ul>
<li>DW&#95;OP&#95;plus&#95;uconst to DW&#95;OP&#95;constu &lt;const-val&gt; DW&#95;OP&#95;plus</li>
<li>DW&#95;OP&#95;lit&lt;n&gt; to DW&#95;OP&#95;constu &lt;n&gt;</li>
</ul>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function will convert:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 DW&#95;OP&#95;constu, 0 to DW&#95;OP&#95;lit0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diexpressioncursor">DIExpressionCursor</a> Cursor(WorkingOps);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Op1 = Cursor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diexpressioncursor/#a76ebfb1bca92ec8cf347deae857a2b35">peek</a>();</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Expression has no operations, exit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
